title: Boards say I have a new message, but when I check there is no message.
body: As the title says. I checked it several times, but there is no new message. The first time I've checked it, it said there was 3 messages, but I only found two, after going through those two it still said I had one new message. After checking several times it still says I have one new message but there is none.
